downloadTitle: MVP Session 21: Validate diagrams against standards in Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Watch a brief demonstration of how to use validation rules for process diagrams and flowcharts in Visio 2010.
detailsSection:
Learn about working with validation rules for Business Process Modeling Notation (BPMN) and other process diagrams and flowcharts in Microsoft Visio 2010. This video reviews how to check a diagram against the built-in rule sets, identify shapes with problems, and resolve or ignore issues. It also covers importing rule sets from other diagrams. 
This video is part of a series covering the basics of how to use Visio features and capabilities. Visit http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions to learn more and view other videos in this series.
installInstructionSection: The video has two downloadable resolution: 1000k/lowest and 8000k/highest. Click Download to save the video to your computer.
